name: CMMM r/place
description:
Welcome to r/place in Cell Machine!
This is a Cell Machine mod which recreates r/place in Cell Machine

There is an empty canvas. You may place a tile upon it, but you must wait to place another.
Individually you can create something. Together you can create something more.

Cooldown for placing is 60 seconds. You can view source code of the server at https://github.com/milena-kos/r-place-server.

Join Discord! https://discord.gg/9ppBKZfPqv
